text:
When it comes to masks and coronavirus, President Trump made a "huge mistake that's cost many, many tens of thousands of lives," says his niece, Mary.

"All that he's got left is creating division, and that's a place in which he is very, very comfortable." https://t.co/UvwzWfScKH https://t.co/jrZLq296r2

entity.name: US breaks record with over 77,000 cases of COVID-19 in one day
entity.description: The death toll rose by 974, taking the country’s total to 138,201.
